channel.title: Help With Client Please
channel.description:
ok so i downloaded a client to use.
it was AgsPking client cause im using the source.
And im wondering how do i change the ip so people can log onto my server?
i seem to be able to but no one else can.
I changed the ip in the client file and egui.class file is a bunch of squares and stuff.
They cant seem to connect to my server. i seem to be able to.
but i didnt have to changed anything to be able to connect to mine.
How do i edit so other people can use the client and connect to my server???
Please help thanks.

item.title: Help With Client Please
item.dc:creator: @mages_pk_god mages pk god
item.description:
@mages_pk_god wrote:

[quote=“pu3pkclan, post:2, topic:284743”]ok dude go to EGUI and find the old server ip adress deleted it
then put in 127.0.0.1[/quote]
its in client.java not egui fool

Read full topic
